#summary The GCC Cross Compiler for SollerOS.
===Building===
  # Open a terminal and cd to the svn trunk/cross.
  # Run the firstbuild.sh script as root.
===Using===
  # Make a .c file.
  # Run /SollerOS/cross/bin/i586-pc-solleros-gcc (name of the .c file) -o (name of the output executable)
  # Copy the output file to the svn trunk/included
  # Run the testhd.sh script in the svn trunk
  # Login to SollerOS
  # Run ./(name of the executable)
